net.trajano.auth.internal

Class CipherUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.auth.internal.CipherUtil

  • public final class CipherUtil
extends Object
    Utility class to decrypt and encrypt data. It is a compressing stream.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static String CIPHER_ALGORITHM
      Cipher algorithm to use.

                                      throws GeneralSecurityException,
                                             IOException
        Creates a decryption stream. It is a compressed then encrypted stream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - source stream
        secret - secret for the cipher
        Returns:
        the stream

        GeneralSecurityException
        IOException

                                throws GeneralSecurityException
        Build secret key.

        a secret key
        Throws:
